channel.title: Alexandre Vaudrey personal page - Alexandre Vaudrey
channel.description: Lecturer in thermodynamics and energy engineering

item.title: The early history of water injection into internal combustion engines
item.description: Contrary to some common belief, the interest of injecting liquid water into internal combustion engines is actually as old as this engines. However, the original goal of such a strategy was not exactly the same as it is nowadays.
item.dc:creator: Alexandre Vaudrey

item.title: Beautiful view inside a spark ignited engine
item.description: Beautiful view through a transparent spark ignited combustion engine, explaining few things about technology and fundamental thermodynamics.
item.dc:creator: Alexandre Vaudrey
